repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: This is a commentary on Vedāntācārya's Saṅkalpasūryodaya (Aṅka 1-7 ). It is incomplete and rare text.

msItem.title: Saṅkalpasūryodayavyākhyā
msItem.incipit: (1v 1)kavitārkikakesari vedāntācāryavarryo me sannidhanntāṃ sadā hṛdi iha khalu śrīraṃgarājadivyaṅgañjayā (a few akṣaras are damaged.) (1v 2) ā paranāmāsarvatantrasvatantraḥ kavitārkikasiṃhaśrīmadveṃkaṭanāthācāryaḥ kṛpayā
msItem.explicit: (97r 8) sya mama ma(npra?)śaḥ vīdhūntudasya rāhoḥ gṛdhane vedanāṃ pīḍāṃ yo yadhimat sa tthaukta raṇe vintaratāparikramtā mayā radanayaṃtrita

support.p: Guard folio is made of thick wood. Dark brown in color and have wormholes . Both guard folio have upper layer of the folio peeled off at some places

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 3 blank folio and 97 written

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals are used to numer folio. 1v-96v is numbered whereas the 97 last folio is not numbered.
supportDesc.condition: Cracked and wormholes on the folio. the left side of the text is mostly damaged which affects text. Right margin is mostly broken.

handNote.desc: Sometimes the clusters are difficult to read.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ Broken corner (1 akṣara damage) vi[avighna]mastu in the left margin of the 1v.
on 1r is carved in the middle of the folio Saṅkalpasūryodayavyākhyā.
Number 116 is carved on the back guard folio and on the front, number 116 is written with pencil. Also sticker of 116 and 69 is glued on the front guard folio.

listBibl.bibl: Saṃkalpasūryodaya of S'rī Veṅkaṭanātha : with the commentaries Prabhāvilāsa of Ahobala and Prabhāvalī of Nṛsiṃharāja by Veṅkaṭanātha; V Krishnamacharya, Adyar : Adyar Library 1948.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separete words.

TEI.text:
1v 1 śrīmānveṃkaṭanāthā (2 akṣaras damage) kavitārkikakesari vedāntācāryavarryo me sannidhanntāṃ sadā hṛdi iha khalu śrīraṃgarājadivyaṅgañjayā (a few akṣaras are damaged.) 1v 2 ā paranāmāsarvatantrasvatantraḥ kavitārkikasiṃhaśrīmadveṃkaṭanāthācāryaḥ kṛpayā
97r 7paramaha(d?)nirdhāraṇe nirākṛtaṃ nirastaṃ sveṣāṃpareṣāñca nirdhāraṇaṃ niścalaṃ purastāt kṣaṇāt aruntudavidhuntudaguñjanavedanaṅ ma(nt ṭormhole)da 97r 8 sya mama ma(npra?)śaḥ vīdhūntudasya rāhoḥ gṛdhane vedanāṃ pīḍāṃ yo yadhimat sa tthaukta raṇe vintaratāparikramtā mayā radanayaṃtrita
